channel.title: Ruby's Demotion from Sectional Moderator
channel.description:
And promotion to Moparscape Global Moderator :)
On behalf of the entire global moderating team I would like to welcome [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=534060]Ruby[/url] and wish him the best of luck with helping us out.

item.title: Ruby's Demotion from Sectional Moderator
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

And on that bombshell we’ll head for a locked topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Ruby's Demotion from Sectional Moderator
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:52, topic:521529”]Yet, It still managed to do some major damage to the neighboring mind of Krackkid. ;3[/quote]What can I say, you put all 3 of our brains together and maybe have one the size of a normal one.

Read full topic

item.title: Ruby's Demotion from Sectional Moderator
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:48, topic:521529”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=640038.msg4315744#msg4315744 date=1371448795]

inb4inactive.

Ruby_ don’t follow into the foot sets of a lot of the other moderators who did a crap ton of reports for a few months and then just became inactive.

When I had access to the moderate button (moparcraft staff), I’d notice a lot of activity from the mods, but they rarely ever posted anything.

I swear sometimes there was never a page where Davidi2 hadn’t +90’d or +100’d someone.

deathchaos does a lot too, i can vouch for that. i remember seeing full pages done by him.
[/quote]psst
mods cant do anything over +70

But yes, I did have infractions on every page

I’m sure you take pride in that[/quote]And I’m sure you take pride in receiving a lot of those <3

[size=1pt]inb4wegetanother[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Ruby's Demotion from Sectional Moderator
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:47, topic:521529”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=640038.msg4315741#msg4315741 date=1371447525]

inb4inactive.

Ruby_ don’t follow into the foot sets of a lot of the other moderators who did a crap ton of reports for a few months and then just became inactive.

When I had access to the moderate button (moparcraft staff), I’d notice a lot of activity from the mods, but they rarely ever posted anything.

I swear sometimes there was never a page where Davidi2 hadn’t +90’d or +100’d someone.

deathchaos does a lot too, i can vouch for that. i remember seeing full pages done by him.
[/quote]psst
mods cant do anything over +70

But yes, I did have infractions on every page[/quote]

I’m sure you take pride in that

Read full topic

Ruby_ don’t follow into the foot sets of a lot of the other moderators who did a crap ton of reports for a few months and then just became inactive.
[/quote]

When I had access to the moderate button (moparcraft staff), I’d notice a lot of activity from the mods, but they rarely ever posted anything.

I swear sometimes there was never a page where Davidi2 hadn’t +90’d or +100’d someone.

mods cant do anything over +70

But yes, I did have infractions on every page

Ruby_ don’t follow into the foot sets of a lot of the other moderators who did a crap ton of reports for a few months and then just became inactive.[/quote]

When I had access to the moderate button (moparcraft staff), I’d notice a lot of activity from the mods, but they rarely ever posted anything.

I swear sometimes there was never a page where Davidi2 hadn’t +90’d or +100’d someone.

item.title: Ruby's Demotion from Sectional Moderator
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:40, topic:521529”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=640038.msg4314416#msg4314416 date=1371226569]
inb4inactive.

Ruby_ don’t follow into the foot sets of a lot of the other moderators who did a crap ton of reports for a few months and then just became inactive.
[/quote]
Now now, just because you don’t see moderators post constantly doesn’t mean we’re not around resolving disputes quietly.

Spammers beware… For I am lurking in the shadows… I am vengeance! I am the Night! I am Batm… :|[/quote]

I see you too much.

Read full topic
